title: A.I.C.O.: Incarnation
synopsis: In 2035, an incident known as “The Burst” occurs at a Japanese research facility,  giving birth to the rapidly expanding, consuming, and self-replicating "Matter." Snaking its way through the remains of dams and military facilities in the Kurobe Gorge, the hostile Matter is besieged by task forces trying to prevent it from reaching the ocean and mercenaries seeking the truth behind its existence.
